FundTech

Enables Asset-Backed Tokens, Empowers Collective
Wisdom & Transparent Investing

Mailchimp Sign-Up Form

Demo Link

Honour Network FundTech platform enables the creation of legitimate real world
asset-backed tokens,empowers collective wisdom investing amongst the blockchain community where incentives are aligned and ensure transparent management of assets

The problems

Lack Of Real World Asset-Backed Tokens
No Collaboration On Investing
Incentives Are Not Aligned
Centralised & Closed Approach To Asset Management

How Does FundTech Platform Help?

A pool of qualified investors with blockchain identity for asset managers
Enable asset-backed tokens issue by licensed & regulated asset managers
Investors buy asset-backed tokens directly without intermediaries
Enable collective wisdom investing between asset managers and their investors
Empower asset-backed token holders on investment & divestment
Create the life-cycle of asset management on the blockchain
Ensure on- and off-the-chain transparency & provenance using blockchain as single source of truth
Enable efficient distribution of income & residue value on the blockchain
Adhere To Regulatory Standards

Enable Real World Assets On The Blockchain,Collective Wisdom Investing & Transparent Management of Assets

Life-Cycle Of Fund Creation And Management On The Blockchain

  • Investor Registration & Verification

    • Registration And Verification Of Investors Adhering To Regulatory Standards

  • Fund Token Creation & Sales

    • Creation of blockchain tokens representing the ownership of the Fund
    • Enable sales process of the Fund Tokens to investors

  • Fund Management

    • Management of Fund’s operations on the blockchain such as deployment of fund, distribution of income & residue value of the Fund.

  • Vote Management

    • Creation and management of voting mechanism

Why We Are Different?

We Stand Out For Having All Right Things

  • We Bring Real World Assets To The Blockchain

    Digitalized, Decentralized, Disintermediated & Democratize

  • We Adhere To Regulatory Standards

    We stay abreast with regulatory requirements & embed them into our solutions

  • We have Use Case & Committed Customer

    FundTech platform serving the Fund Management industry and Fleur Capital (S) Pte. Ltd. is our pilot customer

  • We develop Community & Industry

    We incubate inclusive Innovation Labs, build an ecosystem of solution partners and host international conferences, forums & discussions

  • We have Outstanding “Token Economic” Fundamentals & Vision

    Customers stake Honour Network Access Tokens to use our solutions reducing

  • We have the Expertise & Technology

    Team hails from asset management background with deep skills in blockchain technology & transformative strategies

  • We Embed Social Inclusion in Our Business

    Contribution to social good is embedded in our business

Our Benefits

  • Blockchain Community & Investors

    • Gain access to quality real world asset-backed tokens
    • Gain transparency, accountability & open audit of their investment
    • Gain ability to vote on the investment & divestment
    • Asset managers are motivated to collaborate

  • Asset Managers

    • Faster fundraising from existing pool of qualified investors without intermediaries Access to a new source of funding - crypto community & crypto holders
    • Ability to offer transparency, accountability & public audit efficiently
    • Attract a new generation of global customers who prefer transparency, immutability and openness of blockchain - “The Millenials”
    • Lower cost of asset management & administration, increased efficiency Ability to bring real word assets to the blockchain community

Honour Network Fund Tech Platform Roadmap

  • Phase 1
    Testnet Deployment

    Minimum Viable Product on Testnet

    Life-Cycle Of Fund Creation And Management On The Blockchain

  • Phase 2
    Customers Ready On MainNet

    Production Version On MainNet

    Singapore Customers Ready Onboarding Of Investors

    Fundraising For Pilot Customers

  • Phase 3
    International Deployment

    Develop & test localized version of platform

    Focus Regions:

    North Asia (Hong Kong, Shang Hai, Korea & Japan)

    Europe

    Arab Nations

    South Pacific (Melbourne/Sydney)

    Singapore Innovation Lab

    Host Singapore Conference

  • Phase 4
    International Customer Ready

    All regulatory compliance met

    International customers ready

    International Innovation Lab

    Host International Conference

    Social Give Back

    Our Business Model Embeds Social Give Back Programme To Benefit Socially Excluded, Not Just Financially Excluded

    Enhance Intellectual

    • Financial Literacy & Technology Training

    Enhance Minds

    • Programs for kids, educators & parents to see the world outside of villages. To change and evolve their minds

    Social Schooling

    • Programs to entice kids to go back to school. To show parents value of sending kids to schools.

    Enhance Minds

    • Crypto wallet for the extreme poor. For usage after leaving school age where future worth helps in supporting their future social needs.
